name: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock (elwampa)
description:
A simulation of the Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock game (Now with sound!). It was made for fun in response to https://www.tiktok.com/@livingrps.

[s] to toggle sound.

The HTML version lags a bit; I will improve the performance soon.

The rules are:

cutscoverscrushespoisonssmashesdecapitateseatsdisprovesvaporizescrushes
